text: Mohammad Reza Gharaei (; born 1980) is an Iranian Strongman and powerlifter. Reza Gharaei biography بیوگرافی رضا قراییبیوگرافی رضا قرایی ==Strongman career== Reza has competed for Iran in several international strongman competitions. Strongman Cup - Russia, 2006 IFSA World Open Final, 2005World's Strongest Man, 2006Persian Gulf World Strongman Cup, 2007 Reza represented Iran in the 2006 World's Strongest Man contest,Worlds Strongest Man 2006 Groups but failed reach the finals. Reza also competed in the IFSA World Open in 2005, finishing in 8th place. Reza participated four times (2004, 2007–2008, 2010) in Iran's Strongest Man competition, winning in 2004, 2007 & 2008.محراب فاطمي و رضا قرايي در مسابقه مردان آهنين شركت ميكنند ==References== ==See also== *2006 World's Strongest Man *Iran's Strongest Man Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian strength athletes Category:Iranian powerlifters
title: Reza Gharaei
